name: Marble Mission
description:
Numerous levels are in Marble Mission.
Try for three stars at every level!

[How to control]
1. Touch where you want to launch the ball
2. Match 3 balls in the same color to remove.
3. You can change the ball by touching the launch pad.
4. Achieve more combos to get a higher score.

[Game Feature]
Easy and fun game for everyone.
Amazing level design: Easy to learn but hard to master
Tons of maps with different shapes
Various in-game elements (bombs, arrows, fireworks, and etc.)
Amazing graphics
Most optimized game for mobile devices of small app size
Offline gameplay supported (playable without internet connection)
1 on 1 multiplayer supported
16 languages supported
Leaderboard, Achievement supported

-Free to play marble game, download now!
